author: Redacción El País
title: Luto en el fútbol: murió el exjugador francés François Bracci
text: Deportes Luto en el fútbol: murió el exjugador francés François Bracci El exfutbolista vistió en 18 oportunidades la camiseta de la Selección de Francia. [Por: Redacción El País](/autor/redaccion-el-pais/) Luto en el mundo del fútbol. El exdefensa internacional del Olympique de Marsella François Bracci falleció este jueves (28 de diciembre) a los 72 años, anunció el club de fútbol francés en comunicado de prensa en su página web. [“François Bracci se ha ido. El Olympique de Marsella envía su más sentido pésame a su familia y seres queridos”](https://www.elpais.com.co/deportes/de-quien-se-trata-millonarios-se-lleva-a-un-exjugador-de-atletico-nacional-2701.html), fue el mensaje que publicó el Olympique de Marsella en su perfil de X, antiguo Twitter. Originario de Beinheim, Alsacia, el exfutbolista murió cerca de Alès tras una larga enfermedad, informó el periódico L’Equipe. Bracci es el tercer jugador con más partidos (349) con el Olympique de Marsella, detrás de Steve Mandanda (613) y Roger Scotti (452), equipo con el que fue campeón de Francia en 1972 y con el que también ganó la Copa de Francia en 1976. De igual manera, el exjugador francés se destacó con su equipo y su buen rendimiento lo llevó a vestir en 18 ocasiones la camiseta de la selección francesa, con la que participó en el Mundial de Argentina 1978. [Bracci jugó también en el Estrasburgo, el Burdeos, el Ruán y el Beziers, donde terminó su carrera como futbolista, antes de pasar a ser entrenador. ](https://www.elpais.com.co/deportes/asi-se-jugara-la-primera-de-la-liga-betplay-2024-l-2120.html)Luego de esto, el natural de Beinheim tomó la decisión de continuar su carrera en los banquillos. Primero fue asistente del Olympique Lyon y luego se convirtió en entrenador en propiedad del MC Alger, del CS Constantine y del Olympique Khouribga. Por otra pare, [François Bracci tuvo una breve carrera política, materializada por una candidatura a las elecciones europeas de 2009 bajo la bandera de Debout la République](https://www.elpais.com.co/deportes/le-salio-competencia-a-atletico-nacional-por-david-ospina-un-equipo-espanol-podria-fichar-al-arquero-de-la-seleccion-colombia-2725.html), durante las cuales el partido de Nicolas Dupont-Aignan sólo obtuvo el 1,77% de los votos, insuficiente para enviar a algún funcionario a ocupar el cargo.

author: ANTARA News Agency
title: Banjarmasin Mayor says landfill supplies free methane gas to residents' houses - ANTARA News Kalimantan Selatan
text: "We have built the network, beginning in 2024 it will be officially distributed," he said during the 2023 Year End Reflection Chat with People and Communities (Ngobras) at the Kampung Ketupat attraction, Wednesday night. He said Basirih landfill produces a lot of methane gas can be utilized for cooking and other purposes. The city government has built network infrastructure to supply residents' homes so it is not wasted. "The plan is 60 residents houses around the Basirih landfill will be contributed by methane gas complete with stove," said Ibnu Sina. In last February, the Environment and Forestry Ministry official Rosa Vivien Ratnawati said that the ministry is aiming to put the methane gas generated by all waste landfills to use by 2050. At a “Climate Corner” discussion in Jakarta on Wednesday (Feb 22, 2023) she said that methane gas from landfills will be utilized in order to reduce carbon emissions produced by waste, especially organic waste. "If waste can be managed well, then it will contribute to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions," she said. According to the ministry's National Waste Management Information System (SISPN), Indonesia has 531 landfills spread out from Aceh to Papua. Read also: [Banjarmasin govt builds maggots house in Basirih landfill](https://kalsel.antaranews.com/berita/399717/banjarmasin-govt-builds-maggots-house-in-basirih-landfill) According to Mayor, Basirih has an area of about 39 hectares, and this year added by 5 hectares. The reason is, Ibnu Sina admitted, the landfill is already holding so much waste, causing the land area to become increasingly narrow. Measures are needed to minimize waste disposal at the Basirih final waste disposal, one of which is to encourage residents to sort waste from home. "Indeed it is effective to sort waste from home, before being thrown into a temporary garbage site or to the landfill," he said. The city government also continues to promote the construction of integrated waste management site (TPST) or the waste management processing site of reduce, reuse, and recycle (TPS-3R). In addition, Banjarmasin also continues to promote waste banks in residential areas. Now there are more than 300 units of waste bank available. Read also: [Banjarmasin Health Office confirms three patients positive for COVID-19](https://kalsel.antaranews.com/berita/399948/banjarmasin-health-office-confirms-three-patients-positive-for-covid-19) Read also: [Ministry bestows Banjarmasin Very Innovative City Award](https://kalsel.antaranews.com/berita/398490/ministry-bestows-banjarmasin-very-innovative-city-award)

author: Jörn Krieger
title: Wolfgang Elsäßer joins CH Media
text:
Wolfgang Elsäßer is leaving Swisscom subsidiary blue Entertainment to join Swiss media company CH Media on June 1, 2024.
The German media manager, who becomes part of CH Media’s management board, will take over the management of the Swiss TV business with the channels 3+ and TV24 as well as the streaming service oneplus.
In his previous role as CEO of blue, Elsäßer was responsible for the operational and strategic management of Swisscom’s entertainment business, leading over 700 employees at 14 locations. From 2016 to 2019, Elsäßer headed Deutsche Telekom’s TV business in Germany, prior to which he was Managing Director of Astra Deutschland.
“Wolfgang Elsäßer not only has extensive experience in the pay TV and streaming business, he is also a proven leader with team player qualities. I am delighted that I have been able to gain him for my team,” said Michael Wanner, CEO of CH Media.
Elsäßer added: “The potential of CH Media TV AG is huge: the many TV channels, the oneplus app, which is very well distributed in the Swiss market, as well as the great content worlds of live sport, fiction and, in particular, the broad factual entertainment offering. In addition, with the many other content worlds of the CH Media Group, we have a huge ecosystem of new opportunities. I am highly motivated to exploit this potential together with my colleagues.”
Elsäßer succeeds Roger Elsener, who is leaving CH Media at his own request.
